Posts.EditableText:
Just copying/pasting the reply I sent by email in case it's useful to others:

I see you're using the picture frame for your images - unfortunately, that doesn't work in the current version of the converter. The reason for that is the converter was originally designed to create mobile apps, and having a static picture on-screen doesn't really work well for mobile.

If you change it so that room pictures are displayed in-line with the text when the player enters the room, that should work.
